description: This file defines theming configurations for a Flutter application, including color schemes and UI component styles for both light and dark themes.

classes.name: AppThemes
classes.description: A class providing static theme data for light and dark modes in a Flutter app, including color schemes and widget themes.

methods.name: AppThemes.lightTheme
methods.description: Static property defining the light theme configuration for the app.

methods.name: AppThemes.darkTheme
methods.description: Static property defining the dark theme configuration for the app.
